meanings.definition: The process of aging or deteriorating through exposure to light or sunlight.
meanings.sent1: Excessive photoagings can cause damage to the skin over time.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the photoagings on the old painting due to years of sunlight exposure.
meanings.sent3: The photoagings on the antique mirror made it look like it had seen too much sun.
meanings.sent4: The photoagings on the ancient parchment gave it a weathered and worn appearance.
meanings.sent5: The photoagings on the faded photograph made it look like a relic from the past.

meanings.definition: The act of digitally altering a photograph to simulate the effects of aging or deterioration.
meanings.sent1: He used photoagings to make the picture look like it was taken decades ago.
meanings.sent2: The artist specialized in creating realistic photoagings for historical documentaries.
meanings.sent3: The photoagings on the digital image made it appear as if it had been stored in an attic for years.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in photoagings transformed modern photos into vintage masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The photoagings on the portrait added a touch of nostalgia to the otherwise new photograph.
